analyzed: haññe yā iva api koci na

original: Kiṁ te sutaṁ vā diṭṭhaṁ vā,
analyzed: kim te sutam vā diṭṭham vā
na iva itthī na pumān āsi
ye kecid ime mānujāḥ jīva loke
accheḥ a rūpam tava yādisan ca
atha kena vaṇṇena tava ayam id hi
saccam ca dhammo ca damo ca cāgo
pucchassu mama rāja tava isa attho

original: Puṭṭho ca me nārada mā musā bhaṇi;
analyzed: ca me nārada mā musā bhaṇi

original: Atthi nu devā pitaro nu atthi,
analyzed: atthi nu devā pitaraḥ nu atthi
lokaḥ paraḥ atthi janaḥ yam āhu
attha iva devā pitaro ca atthi
lokaḥ paraḥ atthi janaḥ yam āhu
lokam param na vidū moha yuttā
idhā iva me pañca satāni dehi
idha iva yaḥ hoti adhamma sīlo

original: Sā neva rattī na divā paññāyati,
analyzed: sā na iva rattī na divā paññāyati

original: Sabalo ca sāmo ca duve suvānā,
analyzed: sabalo ca sāmo ca duve suvānā
na tamhi sukham labbhati ittaram pi
bhayā anutappāmi mahā ca me bhayā
attham ca dhammam anusāsa mama ise
usindaraḥ ca api sivī ca rājā
dh iti yo go ca rasmiyo
